title: Login error for Mac
body:
Since yesterday I havent been able to log into league of legends. This happened randomly after i logged out and relogged and suddenly i wasnt able to connect anymore. It takes a couple of minutes to log in and then comes up with the error: "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server" 
Furthermore i have checked different threads about this problem but they all tell you to find a keychain which I can't locate or simply dont have on my computer. 
I am on the newest Mac OS. If anyone could help me with this problem id be incredibly greatfull.
I have tried reinstalling but it doesnt do anything

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq4) and letting me know if that helps, EUW server status is currently showing as online.
